featured.text: What was the favorite toy of ancient Egyptian kids? 36.
For example, Egyptian culture would not have become so well-known if the museums had not put Egyptian mummies on show.
As early as 1000 BC, Egyptian children played with hoop toys of dried grapevine.

definition.en_def: Relating to Egypt, its people, or its language.
definition.example: The Egyptian pyramids are one of the most famous landmarks in the world.
